DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Effects Investigational Drug Oxygenation Healthy Volunteers Under Hypoxic Conditions
DOC.detailed_description: This study healthy subject evaluate GBT440 effect cardio-pulmonary function normoxic hypoxic condition .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA 1 . Males female age 18 50 year inclusive 2 . Able willing provide sign informed consent participate study 3 . VO2 max ≥ 45 mL/kg/min male , ≥ 40 mL/kg/min female 4 . Weight ≥ 30 kg 5 . Male female child bear potential willing able use highly effective method contraception study 30 day last dose study drug . EXCLUSION CRITERIA 1 . Subjects whose exercise regimen Screening , Investigator 's opinion , expect change significantly study 2 . Family personal history congenital long QT syndrome 3 . Participated another clinical trial investigational drug ( medical device ) within 30 day 5halflives , whichever longer , prior Screening , currently participate another trial investigational drug ( medical device ) 4 . Clinically significant medical disease likely , Investigator 's opinion , significantly impact study 's efficacy safety assessment ( e.g. , history significant cardiopulmonary disease arrhythmia ) within 6 month Screening . 5 . AST , ALT total bilirubin > 2 × ULN 6 . Serum creatinine > 1.5 mg/dL 7 . Clinical evidence active infection , within 21 day Screening , may include limited bronchitis , pneumonia , urinary tract infection , cellulitis . 8 . Female breastfeed pregnant 9 . Current smoker history smoking within 3 month Screening 10 . Any condition possibly affect drug absorption , include limited previous surgery stomach small intestine 11 . Known hypersensitivity component study drug
